channel.title: Comments on: What is the Dual table in Oracle and why do I need it?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Axel Achten (axel8s)
item.dc:creator: Axel Achten (axel8s)
item.description: I had to migrate an Oracle db to SQL Server a couple of years ago. I searched half an hour after the dual table, view, function or whatever it could be. Then I asked the Oracle DBA and he started laughing...
item.content:encoded: I had to migrate an Oracle db to SQL Server a couple of years ago. I searched half an hour after the dual table, view, function or whatever it could be. Then I asked the Oracle DBA and he started laughing…
